original_text: And David said unto Jonathan, Behold, to morrow is the new moon, and I should not fail to sit with the king at meat: but let me go, that I may hide myself in the field unto the third day at even.
korean_text: 다윗이 요나단에게 이르되 내일은 초하루인즉 내가 마땅히 왕을 모시고 앉아 식사를 하여야 할 것이나 나를 보내어 셋째 날 저녁까지 들에 숨게 하고

sentences.original_text: Behold, to morrow is the new moon
and I should not fail to sit with the king at meat
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 왕과 함께 식사하는 데 빠지지 말아야 하리라

sentences.original_text: that I may hide myself in the field
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 들에서 나를 숨기게 하려 함이라

sentences.original_text: unto the third day at even
